entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add EndPoint #53183
  • Perf regression: updates #53181
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #53180
  • [StringLength] Attribute makes nullable string required in blazor #53179
  • Theme: .NET 9 is the best platform for Cloud Native development #53178
    9.0.0
  • Missing trailing backslash after pathBase when Path is empty #53177
  • VS2022 17.8.3 very slow to build Blazor web app .NET 8 #53176
  • Scaffold + Google authentication does not sign out the google account on Logout #53175
  • When Http2Limits.HeaderTableSize set to zero results in COMPRESSION ERROR (9) #53174
  • Blazor Web Assembly Stand Alone generates connection reset exceptions #53172
  • AuthenticationStateProvider custom implementation in .NET 8 #53182
  • Make it possible to resolve the method info from the specific delegate type when using AddRouteHandler #53171
    9.0-preview1
  • How to get the GET account/2fa and POST account/2fa in dotnet 8 identity endpoints. #53169
  • Blazor InputSelect does not select the value when using SSR #53167
  • SignalR prevents .NET8 app to stop if clients are connected #53165
  • Blazor 8 + Firefox routing issue - NS_ERROR_NET_RESET #53164
  • Not possible to call JavaScript method #53161

Closed

  • MultipartFormDataContent with CancellationToken Error #53092
  • Perf regression: fortunes, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #53160
  • [Blazor WebAssembly] Create performance benchmarks for Blazor against other UI frameworks #23571
    Backlog
  • Blazor custom router is broken on .Net 8 #53135
  • Routing issues or just by design? #53130
  • ASP.NET Core over HTTP.SYS changes the redirect URL in 302 response to HTTPS protocol #53149
  • ControllerFeatureProvider throws System.Reflection.ReflectionTypeLoadException: "Unable to load one or more of the requested types. Could not load type 'Npgsql.Internal.TypeHandling.TypeHandlerResolverFactory' #53134
  • SignalR ReactJS multiple connections #53163
  • Perf regression: fortunes, mapaction, multiple_queries #53148
  • OutputCaching Middleware #40232
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Support resolving MethodInfo from strongly-typed route handler delegate #53184
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, feature-rdf
  • InputBase should clear validation message store on Dispose for dynamic forms #53162
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Set all mac job timeouts to 90 minutes #53173
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Update other packages to bundle with rollup #53117
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Use Microsoft.AspNetCore.InternalTesting.csproj for _GetPackageVersionInfo #53152
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Remove _GetPackageVersionInfo from Npm.Workspace.nodeproj #53153
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Centralize our JS build setup #53150
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Auto render mode improvements #53159
    area-blazor
  • Always install node & build node components in CI #53154
    area-infrastructure
  • Using FrozenDictionaries in IEndpointAddressScheme implementations #52854
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix duplicated place holder in log message #53009
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52973
    area-blazor, ask-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52972
    area-blazor, ask-mode, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52971
    area-blazor, ask-mode, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52767
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52744
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53157
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Use SHA256 for RPM digest #53158
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Harden SignatureEquals nullability checks #53052
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
